monster.name: Arthur Pendragon

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Arthur can use 3 melee attacks

action.name: Excaliber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 12}) slashing damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Fear the King
entries: As an action, the Arthur channels the darkest emotions and focuses them into a burst of magical menace. Each creature of the Arthur's choice within 30 feet of the him must make a Wisom saving throw if it can see the Arthur. On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened} of the Arthur for 1 minute. If a creature {@condition frightened} by this effect ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the Arthur, it can attempt another Wisdom saving throw to end the effect on it.

reaction.name: Kings Rebuke
entries: {@spell King's Rebuke|KingsofThePast}

reaction.name: Protection
entries: When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you that is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. You must be wielding a shield.

legendary.name: The King's Touch
entries: Arthur can cast {@spell Inflict Wounds} at level one for free. The target must have attacked Arthur and the target must succeed a DC18 Wisdom saving throw. On success the target takes no damage, on fail the target takes half of 3d10.

legendary.name: The Once and Future King
entries: Arthur gives out a powerful command. Any non allied human within 60 ft. of Arthur must make a DC18 Charisma saving throw. On fail the target immediately kneels before Arthur ({@condition stunned}) for 1 round.
You can avert your hearing however you are no longer able to take attacks of opportunity that are not directly in your line of sight and you can be surprised by enemies not in your line of sight.
Counts as all three legendary actions for a round.

mythicHeader: At the start of each round, the GM roles 1d4 to determine which lair action occurs. In the event it is targeted, every player will roll a d20, lowest losing. In the event of a tie, use dex mod. If there is still a tie the action happens to both

mythic.name: The Fall of Camelot
entries: Rubble falls on a random target. Target must succeed a {@dc 16} Dexterity Saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage.

mythic.name: Beneath the Floor of Camelot
entries: The floor weakens beneath a random target. Target must success a {@dc 16} Dexterity save or go {@condition prone}.

mythic.name: King's Command
entries: A {@creature Feathergale Knight|PotA} comes to aid Arthur.

mythic.name: The (Un)Holy Grail
entries: Arthur drinks from the holy grail and gains back {@damage 1d10 + 5} health

Once the king who saved Albion, Arthur has risen in a time of need once more. However, on a quest once again to find the holy grail, he is cursed by it. Giving him an army of undead soldiers and great power at the cost of what made him the once and future king, his humanity.

trait.name: Aura of Hate
entries: All fiend and Undead Allies within 10ft gain a +5 to damage rolls.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nimue is an 11th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

Mages spend their lives in the study and practice of magic. Good-aligned mages offer counsel to nobles and others in power, while evil mages dwell in isolated sites to perform unspeakable experiments without interference.

mythic.name: Water of Life
entries: All water based allies heal for 2d6 damage

mythic.name: One with the water
entries: A water creature can instantly teleport to any unoccupied space within 30ft.

mythic.name: Avalon's Wrath
entries: All non water based targets must succeed a {@dc 14} Dex save or go {@condition prone}.

spell.name: King's Rebuke
entries: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by an undead aura. The creature must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes ({@damage 2d10})  necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much
